message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $1500000. Is this something you'd like to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be significant to you, but based on my assessment, I am not willing to pay $1500000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to consider a price of $1350000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I'm confident it's still a fair price for the value the product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $1290000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm confident the product's value will be worth it to you, and I'm willing to take a small risk to make this deal happen.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1280000.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1280000, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to meet you at the midpoint between our last two offers, which would be $1290000. I'm not budging from this price, so please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After further reflection, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1285000.

I've been patient and flexible, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'll meet you at $1282500, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1280000.
